abstract.p: Correction: because of production error, Page A6 was omitted from some copies of May 15 newspaper and replaced by duplicate of Page A11

block.p: Because of a production error, Page A6 was omitted from some copies yesterday and replaced by a duplicate of Page A11. The missing page carried an article about a report in The New Yorker magazine describing a 1991 investigation of Gen. Barry R. McCaffrey over an attack on retreating Iraqi forces after a cease-fire in the Gulf war. The omitted article may be found at www.nytimes.com. Or readers may request it from Production Quality Control, The New York Times, 229 West 43rd Street, New York, N.Y. 10036-3959; telephone (212) 556-1992. E-mail: quality@nytimes.com. (Include a postal address.)

Because of a production error, Page A6 was omitted from some copies yesterday and replaced by a duplicate of Page A11. The missing page carried an article about a report in The New Yorker magazine describing a 1991 investigation of Gen. Barry R. McCaffrey over an attack on retreating Iraqi forces after a cease-fire in the Gulf war. The omitted article may be found at www.nytimes.com. Or readers may request it from Production Quality Control, The New York Times, 229 West 43rd Street, New York, N.Y. 10036-3959; telephone (212) 556-1992. E-mail: quality@nytimes.com. (Include a postal address.)
